Posts.EditableText: Hi, Following this link in the spanish text adventures site (http://wiki.caad.es/Quest#Art.C3.ADculo ... pa.C3.B1ol) I got to a link where the spanish documentation should be located: http://quest5.net/wiki/Main_Page/es This is probably an old link, but it seems any spanish documentation that could have ever existed was there, as I couldn't find it anywhere else. Is there any chance that may be recovered somehow? THanks!
Posts.HTML:
Hi,

Following this link in the spanish text adventures site (http://wiki.caad.es/Quest#Art.C3.ADculo ... pa.C3.B1ol) I got to a link where the spanish documentation should be located:

http://quest5.net/wiki/Main_Page/es

This is probably an old link, but it seems any spanish documentation that could have ever existed was there, as I couldn't find it anywhere else.

Is there any chance that may be recovered somehow?

THanks!

Posts.EditableText: I don't think the Spanish version of the documentation got imported. As I recall it was very out of date anyway. You might be able to find it on archive.org possibly. Sorry!
Posts.HTML: I don't think the Spanish version of the documentation got imported. As I recall it was very out of date anyway. You might be able to find it on archive.org possibly. Sorry!

Posts.EditableText:
Hi!

Copy at archive.org just has the main page, but for what I see, it had not even been completed. Well, I guess the guy at spanish IF forums asking for spanish documentation for Quest will have to improve his english (a door closes, another door opens).

Thanks anyway!
